ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] error when running Heritrix HEAD
ygData.msgSnippet: Is the state directory being reused?  Did a previous run leave behind a je.lckfile?  If so, try starting with clean state dir. Your F: drive is local?  Its not

Is the state directory being reused?  Did a previous run leave behind a 
je.lckfile?  If so, try starting with clean state dir.

Your F: drive is local?  Its not a remote mount (I've seen issues 
writing state to an NFS mount).

St.Ack

bjhong02 wrote:

>
> I download Heritrix HEAD heritrix-1.3.0-200501201420-src.zip, and
> built it with Eclipse. When I run it, I get following error. The

> are set.
